request.description:
# New reservation webhook

``` bash
curl --location 'https://open-api.guesty.com/v1/webhooks' \
-H 'authorization: Bearer token' \
-H 'accept: application/json' \
-H 'content-type: application/json' \
-d '{
    "name": "new_reservation_hook",
    "url": "https://417d-103-205-69-135.ngrok-free.app/api/webhook/reservation/new",
    "events": [
        "reservation.new"
    ]
}'

```

# New task webhook

``` bash
curl --location 'https://open-api.guesty.com/v1/webhooks' \
-H 'authorization: Bearer token' \
-H 'accept: application/json' \
-H 'content-type: application/json' \
-d '{
    "name": "new_task_hook",
    "url": "https://779a-103-205-69-128.ngrok-free.app/api/webhook/task/new",
    "events": [
        "task.created"
    ]
}'

```

# Task Update Web Hook

``` bash
curl --location 'https://open-api.guesty.com/v1/webhooks' \
--header 'authorization: Bearer token' \
--header 'accept: application/json' \
--header 'content-type: application/json' \
--data '{
    "name": "reservation_update",
    "url": "https://668f-103-205-69-143.ngrok-free.app/api/webhook/task/new",
    "events": [
        "task.updated"
    ]
}'

```

# New reservation webhook

``` bash
curl --location 'https://open-api.guesty.com/v1/webhooks' \
-H 'authorization: Bearer token' \
-H 'accept: application/json' \
-H 'content-type: application/json' \
-d '{
    "name": "new_reservation_hook",
    "url": "https://417d-103-205-69-135.ngrok-free.app/api/webhook/reservation/new",
    "events": [
        "reservation.new"
    ]
}'

```

# New task webhook

``` bash
curl --location 'https://open-api.guesty.com/v1/webhooks' \
-H 'authorization: Bearer token' \
-H 'accept: application/json' \
-H 'content-type: application/json' \
-d '{
    "name": "new_task_hook",
    "url": "https://779a-103-205-69-128.ngrok-free.app/api/webhook/task/new",
    "events": [
        "task.created"
    ]
}'

```

Filters to Find all reservation from reservation id list

```
[{"field":"_id", "operator":"$in", "value": ["62960a9b27473f0034ed0ab9"]}]

```

[Know more](https://docs.guesty.com/#search-reservations)

[List all users](https://open-api-docs.guesty.com/reference/usershttpcontroller_getusers)

Got user id by requesting for all users

item.name: Get all task of a user

query.value: reservation listing status  sheduledFor endTime id assignee

request.description:
# Filters

Get all completed tasks that has clean title

```
{'status':{'@in':['completed']},"title":{"@in":["Clean", "clean", "CLEAN"]}}

```

Get tasks that is not completed or canceled

```
{'status':{'@nin':['completed','canceled']},"title":{"@nin":["Clean", "clean", "CLEAN"]}}

```

Get all tasks of a assignee

```
{'assigneeId':{"@eq":"64300763c9d1a887b8e2f809"}}

```
Got account id by retriving a user
